original_text: Then the king made a strong promise. He said, ‘The Lord has saved me from every kind of trouble. I promise this, as surely as the Lord lives!
korean_text: 왕이 이르되 내 생명을 모든 환난에서 구하신 여호와께서 살아 계심을 두고 맹세하노라

sentences.original_text: Then the king made a strong promise.
sentences.korean_translation: 그 때 왕은 강력한 약속을 했습니다.

sentences.original_text: He said, 'The Lord has saved me
I promise this, as surely as the Lord lives!'
sentences.korean_translation: 주님이 살아계신 것처럼, 나는 이것을 약속합니다!'
